code: import React from'react';import'./NavTab.css';function NavTab(props){var handleClick=function handleClick(btn,color){var buttons=['income','expense','borrow','lend'];for(var _i=0,_buttons=buttons;_i<_buttons.length;_i++){var button=_buttons[_i];document.getElementById(button).style.display='none';document.getElementById('NT-'+button).style.borderBottom='4px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)';}document.getElementById(btn).style.display='block';document.getElementById('NT-'+btn).style.borderBottom='4px solid '+color;};return React.createElement("div",{id:"NT-main-div"},React.createElement("button",{id:"NT-income",onClick:function onClick(){handleClick('income','green');}},"Income"),React.createElement("button",{id:"NT-expense",onClick:function onClick(){handleClick('expense','red');}},"Expense"),React.createElement("button",{id:"NT-borrow",onClick:function onClick(){handleClick('borrow','black');}},"Borrow"),React.createElement("button",{id:"NT-lend",onClick:function onClick(){handleClick('lend','orange');}},"Lend"));}export default NavTab;
